examples: After 1989, peace broke out in the former East Bloc
The crowd irrupted into a burst of patriotism

definitions.text: start to burn or burst into flames

examples: The tooth erupted and had to be extracted

definitions.text: become active and spew forth lava and rocks
examples: Vesuvius erupts once in a while

definitions.text: force out or release suddenly and often violently something pent up

examples: A rash erupted on her arms after she had touched the exotic plant
My skin breaks out when I eat strawberries
